pantheon_beliefs.name: Divine Spark
pantheon_beliefs.description: +1 [Science] from every 4 population in a city.

pantheon_beliefs.name: Lady of the Reeds and Marshes
Earth Goddess
pantheon_beliefs.description: +1 [Faith] from tiles with Charming or better Appeal.

pantheon_beliefs.name: City Patron Goddess
pantheon_beliefs.description: +1 [Production] towards buildings in the city where Pantheon is founded.

pantheon_beliefs.name: God of War
pantheon_beliefs.description: +1 [Culture] for each enemy unit killed within your territory.

pantheon_beliefs.name: God of Wine
pantheon_beliefs.description: +1 [Gold] from Wine resources and +1 [Amenity] in cities with Wine.

pantheon_beliefs.name: Religious Colonization
pantheon_beliefs.description: New cities on a different continent gain +2 [Faith] per turn.

pantheon_beliefs.name: God of the Underworld
pantheon_beliefs.description: +1 [Faith] and +1 [Production] from resources in Volcanic Soil.

believer_beliefs.name: Monastic Isolation
believer_beliefs.description: +1 Faith and +1 Culture in cities with at least 6 followers of this religion, but no other religions present.

believer_beliefs.description: +1 Faith from Natural Wonders in cities following this religion.

believer_beliefs.description: Reduces the cost of purchasing religious units by 15%.

believer_beliefs.description: +5 Combat Strength to religious units in friendly territory following this religion.

believer_beliefs.description: +1 Movement to religious units.

believer_beliefs.description: +2 Faith from Relics.

believer_beliefs.description: +1 Faith from trade routes to cities following this religion.

believer_beliefs.description: +1 Production towards religious units in cities following this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Holy Order
enhancer_beliefs.description: Religious units gain +1 Movement and +10 Combat Strength.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Sacred Scripture
enhancer_beliefs.description: +2 Faith, +2 Culture, and +2 Science in cities following this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Transcendence
enhancer_beliefs.description: +1 Amenity and +1 Housing in cities following this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Unity
enhancer_beliefs.description: +2 Production and +2 Gold in cities with at least 6 followers of this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Divine Power
enhancer_beliefs.description: +10 Combat Strength to all units in cities following this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Holy Warriors
enhancer_beliefs.description: Religious units can move after attacking.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Trade Pilgrimage
enhancer_beliefs.description: +2 Gold and +2 Faith from all trade routes to cities following this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Wonder Worship
enhancer_beliefs.description: +2 Culture and +2 Faith from all Wonders.

enhancer_beliefs.name: City-State Alliance
enhancer_beliefs.description: +2 Influence per turn with all City-States following this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Domination
enhancer_beliefs.description: Cities converted to this religion gain +10% Production and +10% Gold for 10 turns.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Divine Righteousness
enhancer_beliefs.description: Units in cities following this religion gain +5 Combat Strength against units of other religions.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Enlightenment
enhancer_beliefs.description: Great People points generated in cities following this religion are increased by 20%.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Holy Inquisition
enhancer_beliefs.description: Religious units can remove 100% of another religion's followers from a city in one action.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Prosperity
enhancer_beliefs.description: +1 Gold and +1 Production from all districts in cities following this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Supremacy
enhancer_beliefs.description: Cities following this religion ignore Loyalty pressure from cities following other religions.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Expansion
enhancer_beliefs.description: +1 Tile Culture Bomb effect when converting a city to this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Sovereignty
enhancer_beliefs.description: Cities following this religion cannot be converted by other religions if they have a garrisoned military unit.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Maritime Dominance
enhancer_beliefs.description: +2 Movement to all [Water] units in cities following this religion.

enhancer_beliefs.name: Religious Industrialization
enhancer_beliefs.description: +1 Production from all strategic resources in cities following this religion.
